Class SetUtil

java.lang.Object
  com.matrixone.apps.domain.util.SetUtil

public class SetUtil
extends java.lang.Object

The SetUtil class contains static methods for set-related activities.

Version:
AEF 10.0.0.0 - Copyright (c) 2003, MatrixOne, Inc.

create

public static Set create(Context context,
                         java.lang.String setName,
                         java.lang.String[] memberIdList)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
Create a new set.

Example:
 Set userSet = SetUtil.create(context, "PartSet", PartIdList);

Parameters:
context - the eMatrix Context object
setName - The name of the set to be created - required.
memberIdList - A String Array of Object ID's - required.
Returns:
Set The newly created business object.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - If create fails due to a Matrix error.

getTypeOfMembers

public static MapList getTypeOfMembers(Context context,
                                       java.lang.String setName,
                                       StringList selectList,
                                       java.lang.String typeName)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
Get a list of Collection member 'Type Of' objects.

Example:
 MapList memberList = SetUtil.getTypeOfMembers(context, "Part Set", selectList, typeName);

Parameters:
context - the eMatrix Context object
setName - The name of the Collection.
selectList - the eMatrix StringList object that holds the list of Matrix select statements to be applied to Collection member objects.
typeName - The name of the Type to be tested for.
Returns:
the MapList of Collection members Map entry typeName=true or typeName=false
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - If method fails due to a Matrix error.
Since:
AEF 10.0.0.0
